Vanna.GiftLove: How do you know I loved this? Thanks!
Vanna.GiftLike: Thanks.. But I have nothing to give you as a gift.
Vanna.GiftDislike: Is this the most popular item right now, anyway thanks.
Vanna.GiftHate: What am I supposed to do with this?
Vanna.2H01: Isn't it beautiful here?#$b#This is where I spend most of my time.#$b#This place makes me feel calm.
Vanna.2H02: Sorry... I'm talking to myself again.
Vanna.2H03: You know, lately I've been feeling like...#$b#like I'm forgetting something important.#$b#It's as if everything I've been through is slipping away, like it's becoming a distant fog.
Vanna.2H04: Every day just feels... the same, you know?#$b#Like I'm stuck in some endless loop.
Vanna.2H05: Back then, I didn't have anyone to confide in, anyone to share my struggles with.#$b#But hey, things are different now.#$b#I'm grateful for our friendship.
